foods.name: Big Mac
foods.short_description: Iconic double-decker burger with special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, and onions on a sesame seed bun.

foods.name: Spicy Chicken Sandwich
foods.short_description: Crispy breaded chicken breast filet with spicy seasoning, mayo, and pickles on a toasted bun.

foods.name: Fish Tacos
foods.short_description: Battered fish strips with cabbage slaw, lime crema, and pico de gallo in soft corn tortillas.

foods.name: Double Cheeseburger
foods.short_description: Two beef patties with melted American cheese, pickles, onions, and condiments on a plain bun.

foods.name: Chicken Nuggets (10pc)
foods.short_description: Bite-sized pieces of breaded chicken breast served with choice of dipping sauce.

foods.name: Supreme Pizza Slice
foods.short_description: Large slice topped with pepperoni, sausage, bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms.

foods.name: Burrito Bowl
foods.short_description: Rice, beans, choice of meat, lettuce, cheese, and fresh salsa in a convenient bowl.

foods.name: Classic Hot Dog
foods.short_description: All-beef hot dog topped with mustard, ketchup, onions, and relish in a soft bun.

foods.name: Chicken Wings (8pc)
foods.short_description: Crispy wings tossed in buffalo sauce, served with celery and ranch dressing.

foods.name: French Fries
foods.short_description: Golden-brown potato fries, perfectly seasoned with salt and served hot and crispy.

foods.name: Veggie Wrap
foods.short_description: Fresh vegetables, hummus, and feta cheese wrapped in a spinach tortilla.

foods.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
foods.short_description: Grilled chicken breast over romaine lettuce with parmesan, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

foods.name: Philly Cheesesteak
foods.short_description: Thinly sliced beef with melted cheese, grilled onions, and peppers on a hoagie roll.

foods.name: Onion Rings
foods.short_description: Thick-cut onions battered and fried until golden, served with dipping sauce.

foods.name: Ice Cream Sundae
foods.short_description: Vanilla soft-serve topped with hot fudge, whipped cream, nuts, and a cherry.

foods.name: Nasi Goreng
foods.short_description: Iconic Indonesian fried rice with sweet soy sauce, served with fried egg, chicken, and prawn crackers.

foods.name: Rendang
foods.short_description: Slow-cooked caramelized beef in coconut milk and spices, voted world's most delicious food.

foods.name: Sate Ayam
foods.short_description: Grilled chicken skewers served with rich peanut sauce, rice cake, and sweet soy sauce.

foods.name: Gado-gado
foods.short_description: Mixed vegetables with tofu, tempeh, and egg, dressed in peanut sauce dressing.

foods.name: Soto Ayam
foods.short_description: Traditional chicken soup with turmeric broth, vermicelli, eggs, and aromatic herbs.

foods.name: Beef Bakso
foods.short_description: Indonesian meatballs in clear soup with noodles, bok choy, and crispy fried shallots.

foods.name: Nasi Uduk
foods.short_description: Fragrant coconut rice served with various side dishes like chicken, tempeh, and sambal.

foods.name: Mie Goreng
foods.short_description: Stir-fried noodles with chicken, vegetables, and sweet soy sauce, topped with fried shallots.

foods.name: Sambal Udang
foods.short_description: Spicy stir-fried shrimp in chili sauce with petai beans and lime leaves.

foods.name: Sop Buntut
foods.short_description: Rich oxtail soup with carrots, potatoes, and celery in clear aromatic broth.

foods.name: Martabak Telur
foods.short_description: Stuffed savory pancake with minced meat, eggs, and green onions, served with curry sauce.

foods.name: Nasi Campur
foods.short_description: Mixed rice plate with various sides like rendang, egg, vegetables, and sambal.

foods.name: Sate Lilit
foods.short_description: Balinese minced fish satay wrapped around lemongrass stalks, grilled to perfection.

foods.name: Bebek Goreng
foods.short_description: Crispy fried duck served with steamed rice, vegetables, and spicy sambal.

foods.name: Pisang Goreng
foods.short_description: Deep-fried battered banana fritters, popular street food snack served with palm sugar.
